name: Beyond the Horizon ISSG
membership: PRESS CLUB BRUSSELS, RADICALISATION AWARENESS NETWORK(RAN), ENTERPRISE EUROPE NETWORK, SECURITY 4 NETWORK.
goal: To contribute to global understanding of peace and security by involving especially within the EU institutions.
interests: Budget, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, External Relations, Foreign affairs and security policy, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Migration and asylum
euInitiatives: All EU foreign affairs and security policies (especially Eastern Mediterranean, Middle East and Northern Africa)
